question_text: We are now going to start the interview.
Please tell me more about yourself.
Why do you want to work here?.
Why did you leave your last job or no longer with the commpany?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
What do you want to see in your next role?
Tell me how you prioritize your time with all urgent priorities
Tell me about a time you took initiative at work
Tell me how you deal with difficult people who don't agree with you
Wooh - that was great. Do you have any questions for us?
